title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui (formerly ollama-ui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama with chat-like interface, model management, and OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with fluent API and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Lightweight Node.js CLI wrapper around the Ollama REST API for quick prompts and chats.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or embedders.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM provider entry that proxies 100+ models including Ollama with unified OpenAI-like endpoint.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets users chat with any Ollama model through slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library wrapping the Ollama API with GenServer-based process management.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container with optional GPU for CI pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and ASP.NET Core integration.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated list of community-created Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for Ollama.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Simple React-based chat UI that connects to a local Ollama instance via the JS client.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a command to summarize or continue writing notes using Ollama models.
